Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
^1-Bombarding Clones RoA fix for 60% effectiveness- ^7Remove # if you want the player effectiveness for RoA #Minions deal 40% less damage
^5-Jinxed Juju- 10% less damage taken
^7--------------
^6-AG- -Kingmaker- Minions have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier Nearby Allies have Culling Strike Nearby Allies have +10 Fortification
-Crown of the Tyrant- Nearby Enemies have -10% to all Resistances You and Nearby Allies have 16 to 144 added Lightning Damage
-Legacy of the Fury - Nearby enemies are scorched 50% increased Effect of Scorch
-Eldritch Gloves- Inflict Lightning Exposure on Hit, applying -19% to Lightning Resistance While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 55% chance to Intimidate Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit
^7--------------
^4-Convocation + Conc Ground- Minions regenerate 8% of life per second
^7--------------
^2-Spectres @lvl77-
^6-Perfect Spirit of Fortune- -Wrath- Nearby Allies' Damage with Hits is Lucky You and nearby allies deal 49 to 798 additional Lightning Damage with Attacks
^1-Perfect Warlord- -Shares Endurance Charges with allies- -Vitality- You and nearby Allies Regenerate 278 Life per second
^2-Perfect Thunderbird- -Grace- You and nearby allies gain 3063 additional Evasion Rating You and nearby allies gain 30% more Evasion rating
-Exposure- Inflict Lightning Exposure on Hit, applying -20% to Lightning Resistance
^5-Perfect Blasphemer- -Smite- Minions deal 38 to 726 additional Lightning Damage with Attacks
